description:
The target of this course is to transfer the Greek language to people interested in the Greek culture. The method is similar to the way we learn our mother tongue. This course consists 100% of video education material. It covers a 700 words vocabulary, phrases, basic grammar and useful knowledge for the life in Greece. Ideal for people visiting Greece, working in Greece, entrepreneurs, kids and in general people getattracted bt the greek culture. Also, with this course you will get free downloadable a great collection of greek folk music and an excellent background music, ideal for concentration and reading - both over 90 minutes of content.

Although Greek language is considered as a difficult one, certain steps in the learning process can make learning rather easy. This method is designed the way we all are been taught the mother tongue. With 4 and a half hours of content and 27 lectures the student will achieve the bsic level in the Greek language. The videos have been shot in Athens and the whole course drives the student not only in the language paths, but also in the greek culture and philosophy.
title: Learn modern Greek - The best method to learn Greek
